abstrac: Design and production of anything print!
bio: Specializing in magazine design and production, I also have an extensive background offering corporate support and collateral materials, annual reports, direct mail, print ads, product & services brochures, virtually anything print. I don't just study a design project visually. A successful project is looked at from all angles, including the client's vision, the customer's perspective, marketing value and, of course, the bottom line. Projects that challenge my creativeness with a successful marketing solution, no matter the size or budget, are indeed my strength and passion.

I am available Monday thru Friday, 8:00am - 5:30pm CST, thought often my projects dictate I work evenings and weekends to meet production deadlines.  I prefer to communicate by phone or e-mail. If I am not available, please leave a voicemail message. I will return your call, usually within 2 hours.

I prefer to work with employers who agree to use Guru's Escrow service. Payment in full is expected upon completion of each project to secure prompt delivery. No credit cards, please.

bio:
Gary Cecil writes short stories and novels--mostly in the horror genre--with the support of his loving girlfriend, Sarah, and dog, Millie. He is currently in the revision process of his first novel, and is also hard at work on his second.

Gary has worked as a 911 Operator, and has held other various jobs. His greatest memory taking 911 calls was when a man on a back-country road, at one in the morning, called 911 and said, "The baby came out." It was a heart-wrenching experience, which ended in a man becoming a father, and Gary becoming a seasoned 911 Operator.

commnet: Another great job. Creative, talented, and easy to work with. I had had family medical issues to deal with and Peter was understanding and supportive. Perfect talent.
Peter is delightful to work with. Creative, funny, talented, timely, and professional. A true pleasure to work with. What a great find.

Peter is both talented and inspired. In my wildest dreams, I had not imaginged that I would be this fortunate to find a cartoonist with this much talent and enthusiasm for his work. He takes my basic sketches and created some compelling characters. What a joy to work with!!

Agree with the glowing praise of previous comments. Gifted, easy to work with and fun sense of humor. I am really having a great time with the engagement and would highly recommend Peter. I hope to keep him busy for a while.
All good, all the time. A+ rating.

abstrac: Because Life needs one big funny Cartoon
bio:
You want a Toon- then I'm the one who can create what you are looking for.
I am a full time professional cartoonist with a syndicated comic strip titled RAISING HECTOR which has appeared in newspapers across the country (www.raisinghector.com). I also was the political cartoonist for a major newspaper in New York for 3 years. I specialize in ALL types of cartoons and illustrations w/ over 20 years of experience in providing artwork suited for ALL your needs.Whether you need a 'spot' cartoon or want a book to be illustrated- I will meet your cartooning and illustration needs.

Will accept direct payments of money orders. Will also accept Safepay.
Fees are based on several factors: per piece or per project and whether or not client wants to retain all rights to artwork.
If agreed upon project is cancelled by client any time prior to
completion, then client will be responsible to pay to artist (myself)
25% of agreed upon fee.
Any agreed upon project will be typed up and sent to client spelling
out all details (work, due date, fees, etc.) so that there are no
misunderstandings.

I will be available 7 days a week between the hours of Noon- 8pm
Eastern Standard Time via work phone, email, fax, cell phone, IM or
text messaging.

abstrac: Quality and Experience that wont break the bank
bio:
Are you tired of programmers that are very technical, but aren't able to get the big picture of how your project fits into a business environment?

I have a breadth of experience from massive database design and maintenance, through chip design and even to nuclear power operations.  I have worked well in huge corporate environments as well as small family owned private businesses.  My BS in Electrical Engineering gives me the technical expertise to understand your technology needs, and my MBA gives me the ability to see how your project fits into a profit focused business.

My latest project includes a spatially enabled interface via Google Maps API for the entire state of California's property records database.  That's over 13 million records.  And we update about 2/3 of those records every day!

I have the skills to learn your technical business needs to give you the best quality product for your dollar.
My greatest strength is the ability to quickly learn your business

Payment:
I prefer payment through either PayPal or SafePay, but I have had success with direct mailing of checks as well.

Communication:
Phone typically after 5pm pst or e-mail any time during the day or evenings.  Frequency is entirely dependent upon the project.

Availability:
I am typically available evenings and weekends.

I am able to complete a basic Admin project within a day with full client satisfaction, and I am experienced in Microsoft word, excel, power-point, Outlook, web research, email-marketing and e-book building. I have now worked in just about every facet of Admin work, from Web research to power-point presentation. I have had clients from around the world, and I have worked on projects ranging from 1 hour work to over 500 hours work.From the beginning, I have remained punctual, communicative, and cooperative with every client I have worked with. I make my work my passion, and that is reflected in the work I deliver. description.title: Music & Audio
description: I compose music to give your business or project the edge that it deserves to connect with your audience. Having eight years of experience creating music and getting my Bachelors in Music Production,

bio:
Composer, engineer, and songwriter in the Boston area of Massachusetts.

When he was only eight years old, Matt began to jam away on a toy keyboard he received for his birthday. Fourteen years later, he graduated from Full Sail University with a Bachelors in Music Production in February of 2013.

Expanding upon his focus in music, Matt has been involved in the video game mod scene for nine years. He is currently the Audio Lead and Composer for a Left 4 Dead 2 modification titled Chernobyl. Matt has been a member of their development team for two years.

Payments: Check

Endorsement: I endorse employers after completion of the work that return the same courtesy.

user.name: Jambo_86
metadata: Hull, Kingston upon Hull, City of, United Kingdom

abstrac: To the world you are just one, but to one, you could be the world
bio:
If you travel to the deepest depths of my brain, there is a little section you will find called The Creation Chamber. In here is where all of the magical and mysterious creations are made.
I see things differently; I see life through a pencil.
 
I was born in 1986 and now live in a little hobbit hole in East Yorkshire. Well, it is more like your normal standard house but as a massive Tolkien fan, I like to think otherwise. I live there with my wife and my son who both engage with my madness (or just put up with it) but they are both truly an inspiration to my life and my art.
 
I am a self-taught artist who transformed a childhood hobby into a love and passion after growing up with many magical tales by the likes of Roald Dahl and Quentin Blake, and in my later years, the fantastical worlds of Middle Earth and Hogwarts.
 
I am very versatile and my style of work appeals to a wide range of ages. I create a style of art which I describe as being simple but striking and I use my imagination and creativity to bring a picture to life and target the intended audience.
 
So there it is, I resemble a hobbit and I’m nuts about illustration (some people think I am genuinely crazy) but if you come aboard for the ride, I promise you won’t be disappointed.

You can contact me through my e-mail address which is : thecreationchamber@hotmail.com

I prefer all payments to be through paypal only. 
You can make payments to my paypal account which is :   jameslent@hotmail.com

If any other payment method is prefered then this can be arranged between the client and myself.

bio:
Writing is an art. Pulling together the proper pieces of a sentence, a paragraph, an article or a story takes experience and concentrated effort.

My goal is perfection. Whether it be choosing the proper word, tone or style, ensuring correct spelling or getting the proper punctuation, I am not satisfied until I have given my best effort. 

I strive to excel at my craft.

My promise to you:
1. 100% Money Back Warranty
2. One of the best quality/price ratio on the market
3. I will not bid before I read your project description and make sure that everything is clear. Also I make sure I can deliver what is required in good quality and on time.
4. If my skills are marginally below the optimal level for your project I will let you know and explain how it will affect the time I need to catch up.
5. I always try to find the best way to do something. If your proposed solution is not the best one I will explain other alternatives to you but in the end the decision will be yours.
6. If during a project we find you need further assistance I am flexible in expanding the scope of the project. In any event after I formally deliver what was promised I will never leave you in the void.
7. FREE warranty for the lifetime of the application.
I am available through Skype, email or phone daily from 9:00AM - 9:00PM EST. I can communicate in English and French. Milestones will be defined based on project.

abstrac: Professional Freelance Graphic Designer with 15 years of experience
bio:
After receiving my Graphic Design Diploma from one of the top 
design schools in Canada (Sheridan College), I have since gained 
15 years of experience working with various clients across the globe.

This is my passion, which means that each project I take on reflects that.
It is not just about making something look good. It is also imperative 
that the final design is functional and speaks to the target market. 

A sampling of services I provide include:

Brochures
Trade Shows
Advertisements
Corporate Identity
Annual Reports
Posters
Direct Mail
Copy Writing
Marketing
Photography

I am always looking for new and exciting clients to work with. 
If you have any questions or would like me to quote on a project 
send me an email. You will hear back within 24 hours.
As far as my preferred payment method, it would be the one standard to guru.com which is SafePay Escrow. Other options can be discussed on a project to project basis.

abstrac: Innovative Brand Management, Marketing and Public Relations Consulting
bio:
Images360 creates lasting, one-of-a-kind impressions through strategic integrated marketing concepts that drive public awareness, produce positive brand exposure, and increase product/service revenue. Specialties include global brand marketing and communications, public relations, digital marketing and strategic events. 

Images360 is led by K. Reneé Overs, a forward-thinking marketing strategist with a proven track record of designing and implementing high-impact integrated marketing activities with large non-profit organizations and Fortune 500 companies. Overs has years of experience developing and refining innovative brand strategies, public relations campaigns and marketing plans, as well as creating and managing high-profile press events nationwide.

The Images360 team is committed to helping you build a strong brand with marketing solutions that are... BRILLIANT.INNOVATIVE.STRATEGIC.UNIQUE.

bio:
Egusi Soup, oh how i love egusi soup and pounded yam. If you don't know what egusi soup is, it is... Oh, that's not what you want to know about me? My bad!

Well, I am a writer, graphic artist and a business owner. I run a start-up publishing firm in Lagos, Nigeria. I am also currently the editor in chief of Talkateen Magazine and so I don't forget to mention, I am a pretty darn good singer.

I'm my greatest critic, so on every project i handle i aim at impressing myself and I am a hard one to please so you can be sure that you will be satisfied when I handle your projects. 
I am an up-comer so I am out to earn my stripes... That's a quality that you should be excited about cos it means I will go the extra mile to please my customer :)

I'm available round the clock (well, apart from when i'm asleep).
It's pretty easy to get in touch with me via email at chudy_ogobegwu@yahoo.co.uk
